org.xbib.catalog.entities

Class AbstractWorkerPool<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.catalog.entities.AbstractWorkerPool<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the request type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, WorkerPool<R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CatalogEntityBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractWorkerPool<R>
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkerPool<R>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    A worker pool for processing request by a number of worker threads. If worker threads exit early, they are removed and finished, not reused. If no worker is left, the pool closes.
